text: Today I made this website! With Twitter attempting to block other platforms and things like Linktree, it seems now's the time to finally get this up and running.
I probably won't update this super often, but lately I've been trying to learn more about music production, in addition to my usual excessive anime-watching.

I at least know enough about SynthV to have made an info site about it ([synthv.info](https://synthv.info)), so that's pretty neat. I hope to expand that knowledge to include other engines like Vocaloid and CeVIO.
Over the past few weeks I wrote an entire [unofficial user manual](https://manual.synthv.info) for SynthV Studio (whew).
It was a lot of work but it's my hope that this will remove some of the barriers people face when learning to use vocal synths.
If you're a vocal synth user, please check it out!
